document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, North Africa, Asia Minor ( Skuhrovec 2013 )

Material examined.

: 1 spec. ( NSPU ) Bobrovitsky Distr. , Rokitne , P.N. Sheshurak leg.,
9.vii.1993
;

: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Derkul, salt grassland with
Artemisia

11.vi.1952
;

18.vi.1995

Biology. Meadows. Adults occur in IV–VII. On Fabaceae , especially
Lotus
spp. ( Lotusuliginosus ,
L . hispidus
,
L . corniculatus
) ( Tempère & Péricart 1989 ;
Nazarenko et al . 1998c
; Mazur 2002 )
